languages.text: "Понимаю, эттфатер. Но сага моей стаи должна быть допета".
"I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю, эттфатер. Но сага моей стаи должна быть допета".

traits.locale_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

languages.text: “我理解，狼领，但狼群的史诗必须传唱到结尾为止。”
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: “我理解，狼领，但狼群的史诗必须传唱到结尾为止。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「分かった、アエット＝ヴァテル。だが、俺の群れのサーガを終わりまで歌い上げなくては」
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: 「分かった、アエット＝ヴァテル。だが、俺の群れのサーガを終わりまで歌い上げなくては」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Lo entiendo, Aett-Vater. Pero la saga de mi jauría debe tener un desenlace».
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo, Aett-Vater. Pero la saga de mi jauría debe tener un desenlace».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Je comprends, aett-vater, mais la saga de ma meute doit être chantée jusqu'à sa conclusion. »
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, aett-vater, mais la saga de ma meute doit être chantée jusqu'à sa conclusion. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, Aett-Vater. Aber die Saga meines Rudels muss zu Ende gesungen werden."
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, Aett-Vater. Aber die Saga meines Rudels muss zu Ende gesungen werden."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Anlıyorum Aett-Vater. Fakat sürümün destanı sonuna dek okunmalı."
languages.original_text: "I understand, Aett-Vater. But my pack's saga must be sung to its end."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum Aett-Vater. Fakat sürümün destanı sonuna dek okunmalı."
